info.description: Welcome to the API documentation for the Base Template Web Application. This comprehensive guide is designed to help developers seamlessly integrate and interact with our platform's functionalities. Whether you're building new features, enhancing existing ones, or troubleshooting, this documentation provides all the necessary resources and information.
info.title: Base Template API Documentation

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token
Logs out the user by invalidating the session token

put.description: Updates the password of the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieves the profile of the authenticated user

put.description: Updates the profile information of the authenticated user

get.description: Generates a new access token based on the provided bearer token. If the token is revoked, returns an error.

400.description: Token is revoked or invalid request

post.description: Sends a password reset email to the provided email address
Resets the user password using a valid token

get.description: Retrieve all permission groups organized by module. Returns permission groups with a value field indicating if the permission group is assigned to the specified role. The role_id query parameter is optional.
get.summary: Get all permission groups grouped by module

parameters.description: Optional role ID to check permission group assignment
parameters.name: role_id

200.description: Successfully retrieved permission groups by module

400.description: Bad request - validation error or role not found

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of roles with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new role with provided information

get.description: Check if a role name already exists in the database
get.summary: Check if role name is duplicated

404.description: Role with such name is not found

get.description: Retrieve a specific role by its ID

delete.description: Soft delete a role by its ID

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of users with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new user with provided information

get.description: Check if a user name already exists in the database
get.summary: Check if user name is duplicated

404.description: User with such name is not found

post.description: Import multiple users from an Excel file (.xlsx or .xls). The Excel file must have columns: email, full_name, username, nik, role_name. Validates for duplicate email, username, and NIK. Returns HTTP 400 if any row fails with detailed error information per row.

parameters.description: Excel file (.xlsx or .xls) with columns: email, full_name, username, nik, role_name
parameters.name: file

400.description: Bad request - one or more rows failed validation. Response contains details for each row including row number, username, status, and error message

get.description: Download Excel template file for importing users. Template contains columns: email, full_name, username, nik, role_name with example data.

post.description: Verify the current authenticated user's password

get.description: Retrieve a specific user by their ID

patch.description: Activate or update status of a user account
Block a user account and revoke all their tokens
Update a user's password by their ID

valid.description: Valid is true if String is not NULL
Valid is true if Time is not NULL
